Detailed Description

Class MediaRefContainer controls the media references in the metadata database. The class provides methods for reading from and writing to the database. It allows the user to add new media references to and delete existing media references from the database. A media reference container is initialized with the path of its associated metadata database. If the metadata database already exists, it is read out and the media reference container is initialized accordingly. If the metadata database does not exist yet, a new metadata database is created when the container is to be saved.

BOOLEAN MediaRefContainer::ApplyFilter (  const MediaFilter &  media_filter  ) 
 

Filters the current media references for the specified filter criterion. Media references which don't match are deleted from the metadata database.

Parameters:
media_filter The filter to apply on the media references.

BOOLEAN  delete_file = FALSE
